description: This file defines a React Native component 'ProfileScreen' that displays the current user's email and provides a sign-out button. It interacts with the 'supabase' client to fetch user data and handle sign-out functionality.

methods.name: ProfileScreen
methods.description: React functional component displaying user profile info and sign-out button.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Async function that signs out the user via supabase and shows an alert upon completion.
